choices.name: X10_Utility_with_no_XRT_and_no_LSV_Com_and_Ind_and_Turf
choices.choiceText: 10. Utility with no XRT and no LSV: Com and Ind and Turf

choices.name: X11_Utility_with_no_XRT_Com_only_Turf_Only_Com_Ind_only_Com_Ind_and_LSV
choices.choiceText: 11. Utility with no XRT: Com only; Turf Only; Com & Ind only; Com & Ind and LSV

choices.name: X1_Golf_Dealer_only_Golf_Dealer_with_XRT_and_or_Onward
choices.choiceText: 1. Golf Dealer only; Golf Dealer with XRT and/or Onward

choices.name: X2_Golf_Dealer_with_XRT_and_or_Onward_Com_Ind_Turf_or_LSV_also_with_no_XRT_and
choices.choiceText: 2. Golf Dealer with XRT and/or Onward+Com/Ind/Turf or LSV; also with no XRT and

choices.name: X3_Golf_Dealer_with_no_LSV_and_Com_Ind_Turf_Utility_Com_and_Ind_and_Turf
choices.choiceText: 3.Golf Dealer with no LSV; and Com/Ind/Turf; Utility-Com and Ind and Turf

choices.name: X4_Golf_Distributor_only_Golf_Distributor_with_XRT_and_or_Onward
choices.choiceText: 4. Golf Distributor only; Golf Distributor with XRT and/or Onward

choices.name: X5_Golf_Distributor_with_XRT_and_or_Onward_and_Com_or_Ind_or_Turf
choices.choiceText: 5. Golf Distributor with XRT and/or Onward and Com or Ind or Turf

choices.name: X6_Golf_Distributor_with_XRT_and_or_Onward_and_Com_or_Ind_or_Turf_or_LSV
choices.choiceText: 6. Golf Distributor with XRT and/or Onward and Com or Ind or Turf or LSV

choices.name: X7_Golf_Distributor_with_no_XRT_and_Com_or_Ind_or_Turf_or_LSV
choices.choiceText: 7. Golf Distributor with no XRT and Com or Ind or Turf or LSV

choices.name: X8_Utility_with_XRT_and_or_Onward_and_Com_and_Ind_and_LSV
choices.choiceText: 8. Utility with XRT and/or Onward and Com and Ind and LSV

choices.name: X9_Utility_with_XRT_and_or_Onward_and_no_LSV_XRT_and_or_Onward_and_Com_Ind_X
choices.choiceText: 9. Utility with XRT and/or Onward and no LSV: XRT and/or Onward and Com & Ind; X

screens.name: Attending_Club_Car_Dealer_Distributor_Meetings
screens.label: Business Integration: Attending Club Car Dealer/Distributor Meetings

fields.name: BusinessIntegrationHeading4
fields.fieldText: Business Integration

fields.name: Are_they_attending_Club_Car_Dealer_Distributor_meetings
fields.fieldText: Are they attending Club Car Dealer/Distributor meetings?

fields.name: Aretheyattendingclubcardealerdistributormeetings
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
Combination of remote and in-person meetings.
5 = All attend when appropriate & participate
3 = Inconsistent attendance and participation
1 = Not attending/participating or not sending appropriate staff members.

fields.name: CommercialIndustrialTurf
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Turf_Utility_How_well_are_they_penetrating_the_golf_utility
fields.fieldText: Turf Utility - How well are they penetrating the golf utility market (note market share in comments)?

fields.name: Turf_Utility_Comments
fields.fieldText: Turf Utility Comments

fields.name: TurfUtilityHowwellaretheypenetratingthegolfutilitymarketnotemarketshareincomment
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= focused/effective sales effort
3= performing well but corrective actions needed to achieve more
1= inconsistent effort

fields.name: CommercialIndustrialTurf5
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Is_the_channel_partner_acquiring_new_business_on_a_consistent_basis
fields.fieldText: Is the channel partner acquiring new business on a consistent basis?

fields.name: Isthechannelpartneracquiringnewbusinessonaconsistentbasis
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = 4 or more new accounts per year
3 = 2-3 new accounts per year
1= 0-1 new accounts per year (begin stage letter process)

fields.name: CommercialIndustrialTurf4
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Are_they_maintaining_adequate_stocking_levels
fields.fieldText: Are they maintaining adequate stocking levels and or demo vehicles for the agreements offered?

fields.name: Aretheymaintainingadequatestockinglevelsandordemovehiclesfortheagreementsoffered
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = consistently works to maintain adequate stocking levels
3= maintains stocking levels during the majority of the year, but occasionally underperforms based on their pipeline
1= only maintains stocking levels when there are promotions. Consistently ordering for urgent delivery.

fields.name: CIT1
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Is_the_dealer_covering_the_entirety_of_his_area_of_responsibility
fields.fieldText: Is the dealer covering the entirety of his area of responsibility?

fields.name: Isthedealercoveringtheentiretyofhisareaofresponsibility
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Demonstrated high level of sales effort across area of responsibility
3= Several examples of counties or target areas that have little to no activity
1= Inconsistent sales effort across territory

fields.name: CommercialIndustrialTurf6
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Do_they_have_dedicated_utility_salespeople
fields.fieldText: Do they have dedicated utility salespeople?

fields.name: Dotheyhavededicatedutilitysalespeople
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = yes
3 = use part time sales people or use sales people that have multiple other lines to represent unrelated to utility
1= no sales people. Use office staff, GM, etc to handle sales calls (begin stage letter process)

screens.name: Commercial_Industrial_Turf_IRSMX_Forecast_and_Pipeline_Reviews
screens.label: Commercial/Industrial/Turf: IRSMX Forecast and Pipeline Reviews

fields.name: CommercialIndustrialTurf2
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Does_the_partner_fully_participate_in_IRSMX_Forecast_and_Pipeline_reviews
fields.fieldText: Does the partner fully participate in IRSMX Forecast and Pipeline reviews?

fields.name: DoesthepartnerfullyparticipateinIRSMXForecastandPipelinereviews
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = always participates or sends the information needed on time
3= Participates or sends in their information more than 1/2 the time
1= occasionally participates or is not invested in the process

fields.name: CIT2
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Commercial_Penetrates_target_commercial_markets
fields.fieldText: Commercial - Penetrates target commercial markets - Resort, Education, Campgrounds, Industrial, Rental where applicable?

fields.name: CommercialPenetratestargetcommercialmarketsResortEducationCampgroundsIndustrialR
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Penetrates all available in AOR
3= executed in a majority of available markets
1= executed in at least 1 market

fields.name: CommercialIndustrialTurf3
fields.fieldText: Commercial / Industrial / Turf

fields.name: Uses_available_programs_to_quote_and_close_sales
fields.fieldText: Uses available programs to quote and close sales?

fields.name: Usesavailableprogramstoquoteandclosesales
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= consistently takes advantage of programs to help close sales. Especially the demo program, floorplans and other stocking program initiatives like F2T demos
3 = takes advantage of some programs, but doesn't fully utilize his demo's or stock cars. Doesn't demo any F2T cars
1= Doesn't participate or only participates sporadically

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Consumer_Financing_Alternatives
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Consumer Financing Alternatives

fields.name: CMP11
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Do_they_offer_Consumer_Financing_alternatives
fields.fieldText: Do they offer Consumer Financing alternatives (even if they aren't the ones with which we are associated)?

fields.name: DotheyofferConsumerFinancingalternativeseveniftheyarenttheoneswithwhichweareasso
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Offer, promote, and utilize financing program including advertised payments on showroom vehicles
3= Consumer financing offered but not advertised
1= No consumer financing offered

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Exterior_and_Interior_Signage
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Exterior and Interior Signage

fields.name: CMPHeading1
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Do_they_have_exterior_and_interior_signage
fields.fieldText: Do they have exterior and interior signage? Are the signs lighted and properly maintained?

fields.name: DotheyhaveexteriorandinteriorsignageArethesignslightedandproperlymaintained
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Where possible, exterior signage that clearly attracts customers and interior signage that helps with an attractive showroom
1= No/poor exterior and interior signage

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Hours_of_Operation
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Hours of Operation

fields.name: CMPHeading3
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Are_they_open_on_evenings_and_or_weekends
fields.fieldText: Are they open on evenings and/or weekends? Are their hours tailored to the needs of the retail customer?

fields.name: AretheyopenoneveningsandorweekendsAretheirhourstailoredtotheneedsoftheretailcust
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Evenings and weekends
3= Evenings or weekends
1=No evenings or weekends

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Matching_Products_to_Customers
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Matching Products to Customers

fields.name: CMP4
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: If_they_have_other_Club_Car_agreements_are_they_marketing_the_right_products
fields.fieldText: If they have other Club Car agreements, are they marketing the right products to the right customer (e.g. XRT and Onward to consumers, Carryall and Turf to businesses)?

fields.name: IftheyhaveotherClubCaragreementsaretheymarketingtherightproductstotherightcustom
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Yes, as well as utilizing demo and signature events
1= No, not making an effort to market the right products to the right markets

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Meeting_Quarterly_Objectives
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Meeting Quarterly Objectives

fields.name: CMP9
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Are_they_meeting_quarterly_objectives_as_reported_in_the_retail_tracker
fields.fieldText: Are they meeting quarterly objectives as reported in the retail tracker?

fields.name: Aretheymeetingquarterlyobjectivesasreportedintheretailtracker
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Exceeding Quarterly Objectives
3 = Meeting Quarterly Objectives
1 = Not meeting Quarterly Objectives

fields.name: CMP5
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Are_they_merchandising_the_products
fields.fieldText: Are they merchandising the products? Is the Club Car experience center installed and well maintained? Have they purchased and utilized other available merchandising tools?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: AretheymerchandisingtheproductsIstheClubCarexperiencecenterinstalledandwellmaint
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Good use of floor samples, hang tags, POP displays and up to date materials integrated with the Club Car Experience Center (where applicable)
3= Adequate merchandising and Club Car Experience Center displayed (where applicable)
1= Club Car Experience Center is not displayed or equivalent (where applicable). Merchandising and floor displays are not professional or representative of our brand.

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_New_and_Used_Car_Mix
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: New and Used Car Mix

fields.name: CMP10
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Is_the_mix_between_new_and_used_cars
fields.fieldText: Is the mix between new and used cars commiserate with the market and the opportunity?

fields.name: Isthemixbetweennewandusedcarscommiseratewiththemarketandtheopportunity
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Strong, growing sales of new vehicles, appropriate for the market potential
1= Little/no new car sales

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Onward_Demo_Program
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Onward Demo Program

fields.name: CMP8
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Has_the_dealer_participated_fully_in_the_Onward_demo_program
fields.fieldText: Has the dealer participated fully in the Onward demo program?

fields.name: HasthedealerparticipatedfullyintheOnwarddemoprogram
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Placed unit(s) in Demo Status and logged all leads
4 = Placed unit(s) in Demo Status, and logged some leads
2 = Placed unit(s) in Demo Status
1 = Has not placed unit(s) in demo status

fields.name: CMPHeading
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Is_the_store_in_a_good_retail_location
fields.fieldText: Is the store in a good retail location that's visible to customers? OR are there robust advertising campaigns to drive traffic to their location?

fields.name: IsthestoreinagoodretaillocationthatsvisibletocustomersORarethererobustadvertisin
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Based on the market and business opportunity, a high retail traffic count, easily visible from road, with an appropriate facility OR robust advertising campaigns designed to drive traffic to their location
3= Adequate traffic in a retail setting
1 = Poor traffic count and facility

fields.name: CMP7
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Has_the_dealer_planned_and_or_executed_signature_events
fields.fieldText: Has the dealer planned and/or executed signature events?

fields.name: Hasthedealerplannedandorexecutedsignatureevents
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Executed All Signature Events
4 = Executed 3 of 4 Signature Events
3 = Executed 2 of 4 Signature Events
2 = Executed 1 of 4 Signature events
1 = Executed 0 Signature Events

screens.name: Consumer_Market_Performance_Stocking_Right_Product_Mix
screens.label: Consumer Market Performance: Stocking Right Product Mix

fields.name: CMP6
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Are_they_stocking_the_right_mix
fields.fieldText: Are they stocking the right mix and quantity of products in line with local market demand?

fields.name: Aretheystockingtherightmixandquantityofproductsinlinewithlocalmarketdemand
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Appropriate quantity and mix of vehicles, accessorized for market demands
3= more than two instances throughout the year where low inventory was an issue
1= Little/no inventory

fields.name: CMPHeading2
fields.fieldText: Consumer Market Performance

fields.name: Is_the_store_clean_and_well_maintained
fields.fieldText: Is the store clean and well maintained? Especially public areas i.e. entrance, waiting rooms and restrooms.

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter51}

fields.name: IsthestorecleanandwellmaintainedEspeciallypublicareasieentrancewaitingroomsandre
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Clean and well-maintained throughout facility for all Club Car visits
1= Consistently dirty and/or disorganized

fields.name: BusinessIntegration
fields.fieldText: Business Integration

fields.name: Are_they_using_the_Customer_Complaint_process
fields.fieldText: Are they using the Customer Complaint process?

fields.name: Aretheyusingthecustomercomplaintprocess
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Logging 100% of issue and submitted in timely manner
3 = Submitted complaints majority of time
1 = No submissions

screens.name: Do_they_promote_and_use_Service_Contracts
screens.label: Do they promote and use Service Contracts? (Golf only)

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance11
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Do_they_promote_and_use_Service_Contracts_Golf_only
fields.fieldText: Do they promote and use Service Contracts?

fields.name: DotheypromoteanduseServiceContractsGolfonly
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Demonstration of multiple service contract offerings and customer acceptance above market average
3= Service contracts offered with some acceptance
1= No service contract offering

screens.name: Entering_Orders_via_CustomerView
screens.label: Business Integration: Entering Orders via CustomerView

fields.name: BusinessIntegrationHeading3
fields.fieldText: Business Integration

fields.name: Are_they_entering_their_own_orders_via_CustomerView
fields.fieldText: Are they entering their own orders via CustomerView?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: EnteringOrdersviaCustomerView
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Expert capability and extensive use of system. 90%+ of eligible orders are entered by the dealer (including 100% usage for Fleet Golf)
3= Some capability and use of system, less than 90% of eligible orders are entered by the dealer
1= No capability and/or use of system

screens.name: Financial_Performance_Credit_Line_and_Floorplan
screens.label: Financial Performance: Credit Line and Floorplan

fields.name: FinancialPerformanceHeading2
fields.fieldText: Financial Performance

fields.name: Do_they_have_adequate_credit_lines_or_floorplan
fields.fieldText: Do they have adequate credit lines or floorplan to support the agreement types offered?

fields.name: Dotheyhaveadequatecreditlinesorfloorplantosupporttheagreementtypesoffered
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Few credit issues with a high % of annual volume as available credit/floorplan
3 = Several credit issues and available floorplan consistently hinders shipments
1 = Sold out of trust violations (SOT), SNP violations

screens.name: Financial_Performance_Good_Standing_with_Finance
screens.label: Financial Performance: Good Standing with Finance

fields.name: FinancialPerformanceHeading1
fields.fieldText: Financial Performance

fields.name: Is_the_channel_partner_in_good_standing_with_finance
fields.fieldText: Is the channel partner in good standing with finance?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter51}

fields.name: Isthechannelpartneringoodstandingwithfinance
fields.fieldText:
5 = Yes
1 = No
Ratings based on history and finance reports; Channel partners not in good financial standing = Disqualified for B&G

screens.name: Financial_Performance_Pre_Defined_Goals_and_Metrics
screens.label: Financial Performance: Pre-Defined Goals and Metrics

fields.name: FinancialPerformanceHeading
fields.fieldText: Financial Performance

fields.name: Does_the_dealer_distributor_have_pre_defined_goals_and_metrics_i_e_budget
fields.fieldText: Does the dealer/distributor have pre-defined goals and metrics i.e. budget?

fields.name: Doesthedealerdistributorhavepredefinedgoalsandmetricsiebudget
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide FOR DISTRIBUTORS
5 = Presented Annual Operating Plan (AOP) to RM
3 = Has a structured plan, but does not include Club Car in the process
1 = No plan or poor plan
Rating Guide FOR DEALERS
5 = Complies with request for financial information and shares plans with the RM
3 = Has a structured plan, but does not include Club Car in the process
1= No plan or poor plan"

screens.name: Fleet_Golf_Are_they_maintaining_or_growing_new_car_marketing_share
screens.label: Fleet Golf: Are they maintaining or growing new car market share?

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Aretheymaintainingorgrowingnewcarmarketingshareq
fields.fieldText: Are they maintaining or growing new car market share?

fields.name: Aretheymaintainingorgrowingnewcarmarketingshare
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= 50%+ with no share decline
4= 40%+ with no share decline
3= 30%+
1=<30%

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance2
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Are_they_successfully_converting_competitive_accounts_in_their_market
fields.fieldText: Are they successfully converting competitive accounts in their market?

fields.name: Aretheysuccessfullyconvertingcompetitiveaccountsintheirmarket
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Established and achieved goal based on area of responsibility
1=Not penetrating or converting accounts based on expections and market

screens.name: Fleet_Golf_Covering_Area_of_Responsibility
screens.label: Fleet Golf: Covering Area of Responsibility

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance4
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: How_is_the_distributor_covering_the_entirety_of_his_area_of_responsibility
fields.fieldText: Is the distributor covering the entirety of his area of responsibility?

fields.name: Isthedistributorcoveringtheentiretyofhisareaofresponsibility
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Demonstrated high level of consistent sales effort across their AOR. The market share in outer areas is equal to or relative to their overall market share
3= The market share in outer areas is 5-20 points lower than overall marekt share
1= Inconsistent sales effort across territory with a market share in outer areas is 20+ points lower than their overall market share

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance10
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Do_they_stock_utilize_and_professionally_present_demo_vehicles
fields.fieldText: Do they stock, utilize, and professionally present demo vehicles and offerings to "Own the address"?

fields.name: DotheystockutilizeandprofessionallypresentdemovehiclesandofferingstoOwntheaddres
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= 100%+ of their UV objective
4= 85-99% of their UV objective
3= 70-84% of their UV objective
1= <70% of their UV objective

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance3
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Are_they_properly_managing_the_Opportunities
fields.fieldText: Are they properly managing the Opportunities and Assets of all the courses in their area of responsibility in SalesForce?

fields.name: AretheyproperlymanagingtheOpportunitiesandAssetsofallthecoursesintheirareaofresp
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= 'Rolling on 45's' 100% compliance
3= Occasional compliance issues
1= Frequent issues

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance7
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Do_they_support_National_Account_activity_in_their_area_for_sales_and_service
fields.fieldText: Do they support National Account activity in their area for sales and service?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: DotheysupportNationalAccountactivityintheirareaforsalesandservice
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Excellent score from NAM + RM review of service
3= Some issues for compliance identified. Mitigation plan is in place
1= Does not adequately support National Account activity

screens.name: Fleet_Golf_National_Account_Fleet_Inspections
screens.label: Fleet Golf: National Account Fleet Inspections

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance8
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Are_they_completing_National_Account_fleet_inspections
fields.fieldText: Are they completing National Account fleet inspections and posting the information into CustomerView?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: AretheycompletingNationalAccountfleetinspectionsandpostingtheinformationintoCust
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Excellent score as graded by NAM and RM using Sales Reports
3= More than 2 issues completing fleet inspections or entering the information in SalesForce
1= Does not consistently complete inspection reports

screens.name: Fleet_Golf_Quoting_i3_on_All_New_Opportunities
screens.label: Fleet Golf: Quoting i3 on All New Opportunities

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance6
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Are_they_quoting_i3_on_all_new_Fleet_Opportunities
fields.fieldText: Are they quoting Tempo Connect or I3 on all new Fleet Opportunities?

fields.name: Aretheyquotingi3onallnewFleetOpportunities
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= 100% quoted
4= 95-99%
3=90-94%
2=85-99%
1=<85%

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance9
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Do_they_have_a_T_fleet_to_support_Club_Car_customers_in_their_market
fields.fieldText: Do they have a T-fleet to support Club Car customers in their market?

fields.name: DotheyhaveaTfleettosupportClubCarcustomersintheirmarket
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Appropriate quantity of well-maintained vehicles
3= T-fleet is in place, but needs upgrades and/or additional units added
1= No T-Fleet

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance5
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Are_they_providing_Visage_i3_Live_Demos
fields.fieldText: Are they providing Shark Experience/Visage/i3 Live Demos to all Installed Base Fleet and Strategic Conversion Opportunities?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!Value54321}

fields.name: AretheyprovidingVisagei3LiveDemostoallInstalledBaseFleetandStrategicConversionOp
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= 100% live demos
4= 90-99%
3=80-89%
2=70-79%
1=<70%

fields.name: DisplayFleetGolfSalesPerformance
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Sales Performance

fields.name: Golf_Unit_Performance
fields.fieldText: Golf Unit Performance

fields.name: Golf_Revenue_Performance
fields.fieldText: Golf Revenue Performance

fields.name: MarketingPerformanceHeading
fields.fieldText: Marketing Performance

fields.name: Are_they_advertising_and_promoting_appropriately_for_the_products_they_carry
fields.fieldText: Are they advertising and promoting appropriately for the products they carry?

fields.name: Aretheyadvertisingandpromotingappropriatelyfortheproductstheycarry
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Have a marketing plan, are maximizing co-op and promoting in each product category across multiple mediums;
4 = Effectively promoting and advertising in most product categories across multiple mediums (be specific)
3 = Effectively promoting and maximizing co-op for 1 or 2 of their product lines with Club Car, but not all (be specific)
1= Poor Co-op utilization and very little promotion

fields.name: MarketingPerformanceHeading5
fields.fieldText: Marketing Performance

fields.name: Is_the_channel_partner_giving_the_Club_Car_brand_appropriate_representation
fields.fieldText: Is the channel partner giving the Club Car brand appropriate representation, especially within the same category of products?

fields.name: IsthechannelpartnergivingtheClubCarbrandappropriaterepresentationespeciallywithi
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Club Car receives top billing and strong representation among all brands carried
3 = Club Car is clearly the secondary brand among like products
1= Club Car is not well represented in effort or results

screens.name: Marketing_Performance_Approved_Club_Car_Signage
screens.label: Marketing Performance: Approved Club Car Signage

fields.name: MarketingPerformanceHeading2
fields.fieldText: Marketing Performance

fields.name: Do_they_have_approved_Club_Car_signage
fields.fieldText: Do they have approved Club Car signage?

fields.name: DotheyhaveapprovedClubCarsignage
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Indoor & outdoor signage that is clearly visible, meets CCL branding/logo standards
3 = Minimal signage but meets CCL branding/logo standards
1 = no signage

fields.name: MarketingPerformanceHeading3
fields.fieldText: Marketing Performance

fields.name: Are_they_following_up_on_leads_generated
fields.fieldText: Are they following up on leads generated through AdTrack, SFA and Club Car Connect?

fields.name: AretheyfollowinguponleadsgeneratedthroughAdTrackSFAandClubCarConnect
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Follow-up promptly and close or activate 90% + of leads within 3 business days
3 = Less than 90% of leads are activated within 3 business days or leads are examined after 3 business days on average
1 = Leads sit for 5 or more business days on average

fields.name: MarketingPerformanceHeading4
fields.fieldText: Marketing Performance

fields.name: Do_they_use_the_Club_Car_logos_and_taglines
fields.fieldText: Do they use the Club Car logos and taglines in a manner consistent with the published brand standards?

fields.name: DotheyusetheClubCarlogosandtaglinesinamannerconsistentwiththepublishedbrandstand
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Club Car logo on vehicles, invoices, packing lists, etc & all are compliant with CCL brand standards
3 = Compliance on minimum Club Car logo/branding
2 = Have minimum logo and branding, but not all are compliant with CCL brand standards
1 = Not using Club Car logo in compliance with brand standards

fields.name: MarketingPerformanceHeading1
fields.fieldText: Marketing Performance

fields.name: Is_their_website_updated_with_current_content
fields.fieldText: Is their website updated with current content (images, verbiage, videos, promotions)? Is Club Car properly represented in accordance with the agreements they carry vs other brands carried?

fields.name: Istheirwebsiteupdatedwithcurrentcontent
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = Has updated their site with logos, images, verbiage and other assets in accordance with brand standards
3 = Some assets are out of date and Club Car products are represented, but not a clear priority over other brands. Brand standards are followed
1= out of date images, verbiage and Club Car is not well represented and easy to navigate to.

screens.name: Registered_and_Using_PartCart
screens.label: Business Integration: Registered and Using PartCart

fields.name: BusinessIntegrationHeading2
fields.fieldText: Business Integration

fields.name: Are_they_registered_and_using_PartCart
fields.fieldText: Are they registered and using PartCart plus order for service parts entry via LINKS?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: AreTheyRegisteredandUsingPartCart
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= 100% online ordering where possible + demonstrated proficiency of LINKS/PartCart
3= High level of online ordering but not 100%
1= No online ordering and/or LINKS use

screens.name: Registering_and_Managing_Cars_in_Tavant
screens.label: Registering and Managing Cars in Tavant

fields.name: BusinessIntegrationHeader
fields.fieldText: Business Integration

fields.name: Are_they_registering_the_cars_they_sell_and_managing_warranty_claims_in_Tavant
fields.fieldText: Are they registering the cars they sell and managing warranty claims in Tavant?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: RegisterManageTavant
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Demonstrated, categorized end-customer registrations and system proficiency, 100% of cars sold are registered within 3-5 business days
3= Demonstrated, categorized end-customer registrations and system proficiency, less than 100% of cars sold are registered within 3-5 business days
1 = Poor registration process and ability to use system

fields.name: ServicePerformanceHeading1
fields.fieldText: Service Performance

fields.name: Do_they_keep_an_appropriate_level_of_parts_stock
fields.fieldText: Do they keep an appropriate level of parts stock?

validationRule.errorMessage: The value you entered doesn't meet the validation criteria for this input field.{!PleaseEnter531}

fields.name: Dotheykeepanappropriatelevelofpartsstock
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= Outstanding parts availability based on RM observation with input from Dealer, Service Parts, and Tech Services as well as stocking only Club Car parts where possible
3= Regularly without adequate inventory and not stocking Club Car OEM parts
1= Multiple documented failures throughout the year with no improvement plans in place

fields.name: ServicePerformanceHeading2
fields.fieldText: Service Performance

fields.name: Have_their_technicians_recently_attended_the_appropriate_technical_schools
fields.fieldText: Have their technicians recently attended the appropriate technical schools?

fields.name: Havetheirtechniciansrecentlyattendedtheappropriatetechnicalschools
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5 = New technicians have been to Augusta within 1 year of hire date and/or new product launch. The entire service staff has been trained and certified within the last 5 yrs
2 = Technicians have been trained but more than 5 years and not up to date with new product launches
1 = No technicians have been trained.

screens.name: Service_Performance_Timely_and_Appropriate_Customer_Response
screens.label: Service Performance: Timely and Appropriate Customer Response

fields.name: ServicePerformanceHeading
fields.fieldText: Service Performance

fields.name: Does_the_dealer_or_distributor_provide_a_timely_and_appropriate_response
fields.fieldText: Does the dealer or distributor provide a timely and appropriate response to the needs of the customer?

fields.name: Doesthedealerordistributorprovideatimelyandappropriateresponsetotheneedsofthecus
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= No negative feedback and a demonstrated report measuring timely response
1= Multiple negative reports with no service department reporting in place

screens.name: X2017_Channel_Balanced_Scorecard_tool_and_action_plan
screens.label: 2017 Channel Balanced Scorecard tool and action plan

fields.name: AccountName
fields.fieldText: Account - {!VARAccountName}

fields.name: Selectatemplate
fields.fieldText: Select the template for this Channel Scorecard Assessment:

fields.name: Template
fields.fieldText: Template

fields.name: FleetGolfPerformance12
fields.fieldText: Fleet Golf Performance

fields.name: Did_they_submit_a_2018_golf_fleet_forecast_by_August_1st_Dist_Only
fields.fieldText: Did they submit a 2018 golf fleet forecast by August 1st? (Dist. Only)

fields.name: Didtheysubmita2018golffleetforecastbyAugust1st
fields.fieldText:
Rating Guide
5= On-time written submission and demonstrated use of opportunity management system
3= Submitting forecasts, but missing deadlines
1= No requirements completed
